text: Hanki vahe'mo'za rama'a mofane zaga kasezmantage'za, Anumzamofo mofavre naga'mo'za ke zamasane nehu'za zamavesia a'ne eri'naze. 6:2 Anumzamofo ne'mofavreramine huno hu'nea kemofo agafa'a ama' osu'ne. Tagufa antahi'zana amanahure: 1. Zamagine vahe'mo'za a' tare tagufa hu'naze. 2. Anumzamo monafinti zamahe nati'nea ankeromo'za mopafi a'ne eri'naze. 3. Seti naga Anumzamofo nevaririza naga'mo'za, negna ahe fri'nea ne' Keni naga havi avu'ava nehaza nagapinti a'nea eri'naze.
